title: Tales from the Genome
summary: Learn the basics of genetics, with a personal twist. This class is all about DNA and how it shapes who we are.

title: Design of Computer Programs
summary: Learn how to model problems, and how to optimize performance by using some of the advanced features of Python.

title: Intro to Algorithms
summary: This class will give you an introduction to the design and analysis of algorithms, enabling you to analyze networks and discover how individuals are connected.

title: Differential Equations in Action
summary: Write Python code to find numerical solutions to systems of differential equations. The models you create will fight wildfires, bring spaceships back to earth, and more!

title: Mobile Web Development
summary: In this course, you'll learn how to build great mobile web experiences. We'll cover performance issues on mobile, and how to make use of mobile sensors.

title: Software Debugging
summary: In this course you will learn how to debug programs systematically using scientific methods and build several automated debugging tools in Python.

title: Intro to Artificial Intelligence
summary: This course will introduce you to the basics of AI. Topics include machine learning, probabilistic reasoning, robotics, computer vision, and natural language processing.

title: Intro to Theoretical Computer Science
summary: Learn the basic concepts in theoretical computer science. Discover what they imply for solving tough computational challenges.

title: Science of Secrets
summary: Cryptography is present in everyday life, from paying with a credit card to using the telephone.  Learn all about making and breaking puzzles in computing.

summary: Learn the basics of programming through HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Python.

title: Data Scientist Nanodegree Preview
summary: Master in-demand data science skills that qualify you for high-value jobs.
